thread.title: VASILIS NATSIS, GREECE
thread.title_full: www.watchfinder.co.uk reviewed by VASILIS NATSIS, GREECE

author: VASILIS NATSIS, GREECE
title: VASILIS NATSIS, GREECE
text: I was very pleasantly surprised by the professionalism quick correspondence and responsible approach the entire sales team and especially i want to thanks to Mr. Robert Brook who helped me from the beginning with my watch exchange deal to its end. I highly recommend to all watch lovers cooperation with Watchfinder & Co.
